title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] Feature/chroma memory service
summary:
**Problem:**
The current `InMemoryMemoryService` uses simple keyword matching to search agent memories. This means:
- Synonyms don't work ("happy" won't match "joyful")
- Context is lost (keyword matching ignores semantic meaning)
- No persistence (all memories are lost on restart)

The `Verte

title: [PR] feat: バックエンドを TypeScript (Bun + Hono) に移行
summary:
## 概要

Python (FastAPI + python-socketio) バックエンドを TypeScript (Bun + Hono) に完全移行するPRです。
既存の Python コードは保持したまま、`apps/server-ts/` に新バックエンドを並行構築しています。

### 主な変更

- **`apps/server-ts/`**: Bun + Hono バックエンドサーバー（17ファイル, 3,634行）
  - Hono API ルーター（15エンドポイント）
  - Drizzle ORM + better-sqlite3（既存DBと互換）
  - ネイティ

title: [PR] feat(openclaw): add OpenClaw Helm chart

## What is OpenClaw?

[OpenClaw](https://docs.openclaw.ai) is a self-hosted AI agent runtime that exposes an OpenAI-compatible HTTP gateway backed by pluggable model providers (Anthropic, OpenAI, Ollama, or any OpenAI-compatible endpoint). It persists conversations and workspace state on disk via SQ
